<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Runes Holders</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/btc/{network}/runes/{nameOrId}/holders"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get rune holders by Rune name or ID.

## Request
